src:
Wagub NTB Melepas Kontingen Peparpenas NTB, Optimis Bisa Meraih Juara
06 Nov 2019, 10:25 by Zainal Arifin



Wagub NTB Melepas Kontingen Peparpenas NTB, Optimis Bisa Meraih Juara



Wagub NTB Melepas Kontingen Peparpenas NTB, Optimis Bisa Meraih Juara


KBRN, Mataram :  Wakil Gubernur NTB, Dr. Hj. Sitti Rohmi Djalilah, Rabu (6/11/2019) pagi ini,  melepas keberangkatan 17  atlet difabel NTB yang akan mengikuti Pekan Paralimpik Pelajar Nasional (Peparpenas) IX di Jakarta.
Acara pelepasan kontingen peparpenas berlangsung berlngsung pukul. 09.00 pagi Wita,  di ruang Anggrek Kantor Gubernur NTB di Mataram, ada 38 kontingen,  17 orang diantaranya  atlet, selebihnya merupakan   pelatih dan pendamping kontingen.
Wakil Gubernur Dr. Hj. Sitti Rhmi Djalillah, dalam sambutannya pad acara pelepasan berharap kepada seluruh atlet untuk bermain dengan baik dan berjuang meraih prestasi untuk daerah.
"Saya beharap para atlet bisa bermain dengan baik dan meraih kemenangan di ajang peparpenas tahun ini, seperti prestasi yang pernah diukir pada ditahun sebelumnya,” ucap Wagub.  
Ajang Multi event para atlet difabel se Indonesia itu akan berlangsung 7-13 Nopember 2019. Selama di Jakarta, kontingen NTB akan menginap di hotel Best Western Cawang, Jakarta Timur.
Sebelumnya  sepekan Peparpenas itu, para atlet difabel NTB telah mengikuti TC dari semua cabor yang diikuti.
Sementara itu, Kepala Dispora NTB, Nusnanidianty, tidak memasang target berlebihan kepada para atlet difabel tersebut. Namun pling tidak mereka bisa mempertahankan perolehan tiga medali emas pada Peparpenas sebelumnya. Menurutnya  ini  sudah prestasi bagus.
“Jadi, jangan ada beban. Hadapi Peparpenas ini tanpa beban," pesannya saat membuka pelaksanaan TC Peparpenas NTB, belum lama ini
Ada enam cabor yang diikuti  yakni atletik, renang, boccia, tenis meja, bulutangkis dan catur. Dari enam cabor ini, peluang NTB mendapatkan medali emas ada di cabor atletik, bulutangkis dan tenis meja. Namun tidak menutup kemungkinan tiga cabor lainnya bisa membuat kejutan.
Sebelumnya, Kepala Bidang Olahraga Dispora NTB, Anang Zulkarnain menjelaskan bahwa 17 atlet NTB yang berlomba pada enam cabor di Peparpenas, terdiri dari tujuh atlet atletik dan akan turun pada nomor 100 meter, 200 meter, 800 meter, lompat jauh dan tolak peluru. Tujuh atlet ini terdiri dari dua atlet tuna netra, dua atlet tuna daksa, dua atlet tuna grahita dan satu atlet tuna rungu wicara.
Pada cabor bulutangkis, ada tiga atlet yang akan diturunkan. Yakni, dua orang di nomor tunggal putra, satu tunggal putri dan satu ganda campuran. Atlet disabilitas yang diturunkan di nomor ini adalah dua atlet tuna rungu wicara dan satu atlet tuna grahita.
Selanjutnya, cabor boccia ada dua atlet yang akan diturunkan. Mereka semua atlet tuna daksa. Untuk cabor catur ada dua atlet. Mereka adalah atlet tuna netra dan tuna daksa. Kemudian di cabor renang, NTB juga akan menurunkan dua atlet. Mereka akan turun di nomor gaya bebas 50 meter, gaya dada 50 meter dan 100 meter serta gaya kupu-kupu 50 meter. Dan, di tenis meja akan diturunkan satu atlet.
text:
NTB Deputy Governor Releases Peparpenas NTB Contingent, Optimistic Can Win Champion
Nov 6, 2019, 10:25 by Zainal Arifin



NTB Deputy Governor Releases Peparpenas NTB Contingent, Optimistic Can Win Champion



NTB Deputy Governor Releases Peparpenas NTB Contingent, Optimistic Can Win Champion


KBRN, Mataram: Deputy Governor of NTB, Dr. Hj. Sitti Rohmi Djalilah, Wednesday (11/6/2019) this morning, released the departure of 17 NTB disabled athletes who will take part in the IX National Paralympic Student Week (Peparpenas) in Jakarta.
The release of the peparpenas contingent took place at a glance 09.00 AM Wita, in the Anggrek Room of the NTB Governor's Office in Mataram, there were 38 contingents, 17 of whom were athletes, the rest were trainers and contingent assistants.
Deputy Governor Dr. Hj. Sitti Rhmi Djalillah, in her remarks at the release event, hoped that all athletes would play well and fight for achievements for the region.
"I hope that athletes can play well and win this year's event at PeparPenas, such as the achievements that have been carved in the previous year," said the Deputy Governor.
The multi-event event for disabled athletes across Indonesia will take place from 7-13 November 2019. While in Jakarta, the NTB contingent will stay at the Best Western Cawang hotel, East Jakarta.
Earlier in the week from Peparpenas, the NTB disabled athletes had participated in the TCs of all the sports that were participated.
Meanwhile, the Head of NTB's Dispora, Nusnanidianty, did not set excessive targets to the disabled athletes. But pling no they can maintain the acquisition of three gold medals at Peparpenas previously. According to him this was a good achievement.
"So, there is no burden. Confront this Peparpenas without burden, "he said when opening the TC Peparpenas NTB implementation, recently
There were six sports that were followed namely athletics, swimming, boccia, table tennis, badminton and chess. From these six sports, NTB's chance to get a gold medal is in athletics, badminton and table tennis. But do not rule out the other three sports can make a surprise.
Previously, Head of NTB Dispora Sports, Anang Zulkarnain explained that 17 NTB athletes who competed in six sports at Peparpenas, consisted of seven athletics and would go down at 100 meters, 200 meters, 800 meters, long jump and shot put. The seven athletes consisted of two blind athletes, two physically impaired athletes, two mentally disabled athletes and one hearing impaired athlete.
In badminton sports, there are three athletes who will be deployed. Namely, two people in men's singles, one women's singles and one mixed doubles. Disability athletes revealed in this number are two deaf athletes and one mentally disabled athlete.
Furthermore, sports Boccia there are two athletes who will be deployed. They are all physically disabled athletes. For chess sports there are two athletes. They are blind and physically disabled athletes. Then in swimming sports, NTB will also lose two athletes. They will go down in the 50-meter freestyle, 50-meter and 100-meter breaststroke and 50-meter butterfly styles. And, in table tennis one athlete will be deployed.
